Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png'}
{3: 'And that was how...'}
{3: 'Sophia stumbles trying to make her way past the carriages, until no Corrupted can be heard behind her.'}
{3: 'She runs until she finally finds a lit-up carriage, and uses the last bit of her energy to barge in.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Help... Corrupted... In the commoner carriage...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: "What's the situation?"}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "We've finished cleaning up. It's a miracle no one from the inspection team lived, but it has caused too much of a commotion to stay under wraps."}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'If "she" finds out...'}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: "Tsk... There's nothing she can do about it even if she does find out."}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Well... You were the one who ordered us to disobey "her"...'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "Although you'll most likely keep your head, it's true that you disobeyed the leader. There'll be punishments."}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: "That doesn't concern you. I've served under ol' Amir. His daughter can't even hold a gun properly, let alone going against me."}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: 'Although...'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'My lord...?'}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: 'That little brat who crashed my birthday party the other day... What happened to her?'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'There were too many witnesses so we had to get her to a doctor.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "The doctor told me that there's no hope saving the lower half of her body and that she only has less than 36 hours left."}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'If you were planning to silence her, my lord, then we do not need to do anything at all.'}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: "That's not what I'm thinking."}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: 'We need to do something. We need her to live.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'My lord?'}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: 'This is a chance to plant the seeds of "hate", we can\'t let it go to waste.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "My lord, you're not..."}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: "Go make the arrangements. Now. Time's a-ticking."}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: 'It\'s time for us to teach that so-called "leader" a lesson.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory142.png'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'You understand what you need to do?'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "It's not easy to find all the equipment and components on a train, let alone to do it in less than 4 hours."}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'If anything goes wrong...'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'W-we understand the orders.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: "My family... Please don't hurt them."}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Hmph, that depends on the outcome of your work.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Lord "Ashlar" is a man of his word!'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: "Alright, I'll do it."}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'Commencing... Preparation for Construct reconstruction surgery.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'Prepare to commence tantalum substitution procedures, NEMCO connection, cardiopulmonary replacement...'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'Give her a standard dose of adrenaline and then prepare to commence organ replacement.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'I see, so this is the technology retrieved from City 173.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'N-not only that, we also learned from "that experiment", to use the technology from Babylonia Construct parts to strengthen the system.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: "Hey, it's time to replace the skeleton, quit dilly-dallying! I can't do it alone!"}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'C-coming!'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: '...All vitals are normal, the secondary "heart" and tantalum "cerebellum" are fully functional.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: '...It worked.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "Now that I look at it... I'm sure she was only able to break through all the barricades of the Corrupted with the help of many who were willing to sacrifice themselves."}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "I hope you'll be able to demonstrate as much hate as the love they've shown you... Hehehe."}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'Uhm, does this mean we can...'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Scram. Your work here is done.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'Th-thank you!'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Well then... It\'s time to pick the perfect time for it to "bloom"... For this flower of hate, that is.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png'}
{3: 'A few months later.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Are you here? Sophia?'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'This is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "This month's supplies and consumables for maintenance work."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: '...This is too much.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "You're the last of the inspection team, of course you'll be treasured."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The new inspection trainees have already graduated and are ready to carry out maintenance work on their own.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Well done. Who would\'ve thought there would come a day when "Hyena" lives in the noble carriage and is even qualified to train others.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Don\'t you ever forget, this is all thanks to Lord "Ashlar".'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I understand. I have never once forgotten Lord "Ashlar\'s" benevolence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Oh? Is that so?'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Good, then. I come bearing some... Insider information for you.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: 'Read it for yourself.'}
{3: 'An exquisite envelope is casually tossed in front of Sophia.'}
{2: 'Sharp Voice', 3: "That's all for today. Remember, as usual, I was never here."}
{3: 'Sophia opens the envelope once she was back in the safety of her own room.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'The cruel leadership of Akdilek Jamilah is planning to remove us—the foundation of her throne.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'And she, is the one behind the incident. She refused to deploy help and ordered for the carriage you were on to be destroyed.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Akdilek Jamilah Amir is no longer fit to rule Akdilek. She became the enemy of Akdilek the moment she forced us to carry out her absurd orders.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'You are hereby tasked to infiltrate the front coach and eliminate the maleficent Akdilek Jamilah Amir. Our dire request rests upon your shoulders.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'It is only because you share the same hatred we do that we have decided to entrust you with this important mission. Your Construct frame was prepared with this moment in mind.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Complete your task and eliminate Akdilek Jamilah Amir, and you shall be rewarded with your life and eternal peace upon Akdilek!'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: '—Ashlar'}
{3: 'Sophia clenches the paper in a tight grip, her mechanical arm instantly tearing the paper into pieces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I understand now, and I will do it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'For Lord "Ashlar" and for myself.', 4: '1'}
